title: Total international travellers entering the country in Canada 2020
summary: A line graph showing the Total international travellers entering Canada in the year 2020 .
Between the months of January and June , the number people remains steady .
July marks the beginning of a dramatic surge in the international travelers entering Canada , which accelerates in August before calming down in September .
gold: A chart showing total international travellers entering Canada by month , in which travellers count drops significantly after April due to the pandemic of COVID19 .
